title: Ayurveda & Aromatherapy (Paperback)
author: Light Miller; Bryan Miller
description: Ayurveda & Aromatherapy This book integrates the ancient healing science of Ayurveda with the modern development of Aromatherapy. The authors have long term experience in clinical practice and have created a phenomenal resource for anyone who wants to use Ayurveda or Aromatherapy for self-health or as a practitioner.
